nodes.text: A Separatist terrorist network was in operation on the planet Coruscant during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The terrorists were responsible for attacks against the Republic such as the attack on Depot Bravo Five. The terrorist network was brought down by a joint operation between the Grand Army of the Republic's Special Operations Brigade and the Coruscant Security Force's Anti-Terrorism Unit and Organized Crime Unit.
